channel.title: Make a monster give something when killed/teleport you etc...?
channel.description:
Okay... so i have starter points on my server, which once you get a certain amount, such as 500, you get an item. Well, there's only one way to earn them... So, i want to make it so when you kill KBD (ID = 50) that you get 1 or some amount of points (Random if you know how!) How would i go about doing this?
If you could help, thank you! If not, thanks for looking, anyway.

item.title: Make a monster give something when killed/teleport you etc...?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Chassy13:

What’s the variable name for the points?

“starter” I just took it right from the already-made starter.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2009, 05:02:34 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Purely Pink, post:3, topic:309584”]I’m not sure if this is correct, as I’m fairly new to Java, in my client.java, i have this in case 2:

else if (token.equals("character-saradomin")) { saraKills = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and this in /* CHARACTER */ under BufferedWriter characterfile = null;

characterfile.write("character-saradomin = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(saraKills), 0, Integer.toString(saraKills).length()); characterfile.newLine();[/quote]

I was thinking about that and I’ll have a search in my clicnt.Java and see if that helps me, but I’m open to any more ideas.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Purely_Pink wrote:

I’m not sure if this is correct, as I’m fairly new to Java, in my client.java, i have this in case 2:

else if (token.equals("character-saradomin")) { saraKills = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and this in /* CHARACTER */ under BufferedWriter characterfile = null;

characterfile.write("character-saradomin = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(saraKills), 0, Integer.toString(saraKills).length()); characterfile.newLine();
